mapper.select: select *,DATE_FORMAT(Article_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as Article_time from sys_Article where Article_id=${aID}
select Article_id,Article_title,DATE_FORMAT(Article_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Article_time from sys_Article where Article_creater=${uID}

select su.user_name,Article_id,Article_title,Article_creater,ui.user_img,DATE_FORMAT(Article_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as Article_time from sys_Article,sys_user_info ui,sys_user su where Article_creater=${userID} and Article_creater = ui.user_id and su.user_id = ui.user_id order by Article_time desc

select t.Article_creater,t.Article_id,t.Article_text,t.Article_content,su.user_name,ui.user_img,t.Article_title,DATE_FORMAT(t.Article_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as Article_time from sys_Article t,sys_user su,sys_user_info ui where t.Article_creater=su.user_id and t.Article_creater in (select userid from sys_team_user_mapper where teamid=${tID} and (memState=1 or memState=2)) and su.user_id = ui.user_id order by Article_time desc

select count(t.Article_id) from sys_Article t,sys_user su where t.Article_creater=su.user_id
and su.USER_Type=${uType}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_Article (Article_title,Article_text,Article_content,Article_creater,Article_time) values (#{aTitle},#{aText},#{aContent},${aCreater},now())
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as generatedKey
mapper.delete: delete from sys_Article where Article_id in (${aID}) and Article_creater=${s_userID}
